aboutMeData.title: About Me
aboutMeData.description: Julia Kan (b. 1999) is a Brazilian visual artist based in Salvador, Bahia. Her artistic practice is primarily lens-based but deeply informed by her background in spatial design, creating a dialogue between photography and scenography.
